name: metrics_net
description: Metrics snapshot for the net tile

rx_bytes_total.description: Total number of bytes received (including Ethernet header)

rx_undersz_cnt.description: Number of incoming packets dropped due to being too small

rx_fill_blocked_cnt.description: Number of incoming packets dropped due to fill ring being full

rx_backpressure_cnt.description: Number of incoming packets dropped due to backpressure

rx_busy_cnt.description: Number of receive buffers currently busy

rx_idle_cnt.description: Number of receive buffers currently idle

tx_submit_cnt.description: Number of packet transmit jobs submitted

tx_complete_cnt.description: Number of packet transmit jobs marked as completed by the kernel

tx_bytes_total.description: Total number of bytes transmitted (including Ethernet header)

tx_route_fail_cnt.description: Number of packet transmit jobs dropped due to route failure

tx_neighbor_fail_cnt.description: Number of packet transmit jobs dropped due to unresolved neighbor

tx_full_fail_cnt.description: Number of packet transmit jobs dropped due to XDP TX ring full or missing completions

tx_busy_cnt.description: Number of transmit buffers currently busy

tx_idle_cnt.description: Number of transmit buffers currently idle

xsk_tx_wakeup_cnt.description: Number of XSK sendto syscalls dispatched

xsk_rx_wakeup_cnt.description: Number of XSK recvmsg syscalls dispatched

xdp_rx_ring_full.description: Dropped due to rx ring being full (xdp_statistics_v1.rx_ring_full)

xdp_rx_fill_ring_empty_descs.description: Failed to retrieve item from fill ring (xdp_statistics_v1.rx_fill_ring_empty_descs)

xdp_tx_ring_empty_descs.description: Failed to retrieve item from tx ring (xdp_statistics_v1.tx_ring_empty_descs)

rx_gre_cnt.description: Number of valid GRE packets received

rx_gre_invalid_cnt.description: Number of invalid GRE packets received

rx_gre_ignored_cnt.description: Number of received but ignored GRE packets

tx_gre_cnt.description: Number of GRE packet transmit jobs submitted

tx_gre_route_fail_cnt.description: Number of GRE packets transmit jobs dropped due to route failure
